title: Crowding out, higher interest rates decrease Ig

content.question: Crowding out due to government borrowing occurs when

choices.label: lower interest rates increase private sector investment
lower interest rates decrease private sector investment
higher interest rates decrease private sector investment
a smaller money supply increases private sector investment
a smaller money supply decreases private sector investment

content.answer: higher interest rates decrease private sector investment

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
